nodes.text: The Gulches were a location on the Outer Rim planet Crucival. Hazram Namir, a soldier from a clan named the Malkhanis, was present in the Gulches for some time during the era of the Galactic Empire. When Namir spotted an Imperial TIE fighter on its way to a transmitter tower on Crucival in 6 BBY, the Malkhanis soldier murmured that he had not seen the starfighter much in the Gulches.
The Gulches were mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
